Based on your preferences, here are some movie recommendations:

  * Title: Total Recall (1990) | Plot: A factory worker named Douglas Quaid believes he is a spy because he learns that his life has been implanted by a space pirate. Douglas travels to Rekall, a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led. Douglas goes through a series of tests and procedures at Rekall to implant the false memories into his mind. After completing the procedure at Rekall, Douglas returns to Earth believing he has been relieved of any spy-related activities. However, Douglas' newfound belief is soon shattered when he discovers that the implanted false memories in his mind are actually memories of a real-life person named Lucy Brown. Furthermore, Douglas learns that Lucy Brown was once a spy herself who worked for Rekall at some point in her career as a spy. Douglas is shocked to learn that Lucy Brown was once a spy herself who worked for Rekall at some point in her career as a spy.

- Paradise Lost (1667) directed by Christopher Nolan. This epic drama tells the story of six men who escape a Spanish prison in 1657 and journey across Europe before returning home to their families.
